footer.tagline: Seamlessly connect and manage all your business integrations in one unified platform.

home.features_title: Everything you need for messaging platform integration
home.features_subtitle: SyncRio provides comprehensive tools to connect, sync, and manage all your business messaging platforms from one central hub.
home.universal_sync_desc: Connect Teams, Webex, Google Chat, Zoom, Slack and more with bidirectional message synchronization.
home.team_management_desc: Manage users, permissions, and access across all connected messaging platforms.
home.smart_workflows_desc: Automate message routing, notifications, and cross-platform conversations.
home.analytics_insights_desc: Track message volumes, platform usage, and communication patterns.
home.use_cases_title: Perfect for every business communication need
home.use_cases_subtitle: Whether you're managing enterprise communication or remote team collaboration, SyncRio adapts to your specific messaging integration needs.
home.enterprise_communication_desc: Unify messaging across different departments using various platforms.
home.remote_collaboration_desc: Keep distributed teams connected regardless of their preferred platform.
home.customer_support_desc: Integrate customer support channels with internal communication tools.
home.project_management_desc: Sync project updates and notifications across all team communication channels.
home.how_it_works_subtitle: Get your messaging platforms connected and syncing in just three simple steps.
home.connect_platforms_desc: Add your messaging platforms like Teams, Webex, Google Chat, Zoom, and Slack with secure OAuth authentication.
home.configure_sync_desc: Set up message routing, channel mapping, and sync preferences to match your team's communication workflow.
home.start_syncing_desc: Messages automatically sync across all connected platforms in real-time, keeping your team connected everywhere.
home.cta_title: Ready to unify your messaging platforms?
home.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of teams that trust SyncRio to seamlessly connect their business communication tools.

pricing.starter_desc: Perfect for small teams getting started

careers.hero_subtitle: Help us build the infrastructure that powers billions of data points and serves 1.8 billion users worldwide. Be part of a team that's unlocking $847B+ in market value.

careers.health_wellness_desc: Comprehensive health insurance, mental health support, and wellness programs

careers.work_life_balance_desc: Unlimited PTO, flexible schedules, and team retreats
careers.innovation_culture_desc: Work on cutting-edge technology with billions of data points and global impact
careers.open_positions_subtitle: Discover opportunities to make a global impact with

docs.docs_subtitle: Everything you need to build powerful integrations and connect your favorite tools. Get started in minutes with our comprehensive guides and API reference.
docs.quick_start_desc: Get up and running with SyncRivo in less than 5 minutes. Create your first integration and start syncing data between your favorite tools.
docs.need_help: Need help? Check out our step-by-step guide →
docs.slack_webhook_desc: Forward Slack messages to your API
docs.google_drive_desc: Monitor file changes in Google Drive
docs.notion_database_desc: Sync Notion pages to your database
docs.create_account_desc: Sign up for a free SyncRivo account and get your API key from the dashboard.
docs.install_sdk_desc: Use npm, pip, or our REST API directly to start building integrations.
docs.build_integration_desc: Follow our quick start guide to create your first data sync in minutes.

security.security_subtitle: Your data security and privacy are our top priorities. Learn about our security measures and policies.
security.data_encryption_desc: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption.
security.access_control_desc: Strict access controls and authentication measures protect your account.
security.privacy_first_desc: We never share your data without your explicit consent.
security.secure_infrastructure_desc: Our infrastructure follows security best practices and compliance standards.
security.responsible_disclosure_desc: If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it to security@company.com. We appreciate your help in keeping our platform secure.
security.compliance_desc: We maintain compliance with industry standards including SOC 2, GDPR, and other relevant regulations.

status.status_subtitle: Current status of our services and infrastructure
status.api_services_desc: All API endpoints are running normally
status.data_processing_desc: All data processing services are running smoothly
